content: *a sweet treat in the afternoon with some knitting and a cup of tea is one of my favourite things to do before the busyness of teatime and getting ready for work or school the next day this collection is inspired by some of my favourites all bringing delightful memories of picking fruits from the garden and baking with my granny sweet comfort * a top down sock with heel flap and gusset the pattern is worked down one side of the sock increases and decrease form the shapes of the fruits nestled together just like they do under the leaves of the plant **sizes** small medium large finished sock circumference unstretched 19 21 5 24 cm / 7 5 8 5 9 5 **skill level** a basic understanding of sock construction how to work knits purls increases decreases and kitchener stitch this pattern has been tested and tech edited 1 https //www adventuresinyarncraft co uk/
